0.1.0.name: wordpress/xclusive
0.1.0.description: The XClusive theme is a fully responsive theme that looks great on any device. It supports all custom formats, Image header, custom logo and provides 4 color schemes. Provides 2 page template, No sidebar and Landing to create your custom home page.
